entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
